title: Spacecraft used to forecast solar storm 15 hours before it hit Earth
summary: The Solar Orbiter spacecraft sometimes lies directly between the sun and Earth, making it ideally placed to analyse powerful solar storms that could damage electronic systems on our planet

title: Why auroras are so much brighter and more easily visible recently
summary: The aurora borealis has been remarkably bright recently. Space weather physicist Tamitha Skov reveals what's going on and how worried we should be about a major solar storm
